txt.en: 'Gorgar! Put an end to this creature.'
'Gorgar! I command it!'
Mótsog has fallen, and you have failed!
Talk to Mótsog on the slope
'You cannot refuse!'
'See how weak you become!'
Talk to Mótsog on the slope
'What is wrong with you?'
'What are you trying to do?'
Escort Mótsog through the aisle the Gabil'akkâ has made
'Ah... your strength departs.'
'Hiding will avail you nothing!'
Talk to Mótsog beneath the peak
'Whatever sorcery keeps you alive has nearly fled.'
'I can reach you from here!'
Confront Hrímil Frost-heart
'I have only to wait.'
'What are you doing?'
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
You have been tasked with escorting Mótsog to the peak above Gundabad, where the last of the Greymauls will confront Hrímil Frost-heart.
'Durin's forces have opened an aisle for us. We must pass through it, and climb the mountain!\n\n'Let none stand in our way.'
Prince Durin has asked you to accompany Mótsog to the peak, where the last of the Greymauls will confront Hrímil Frost-heart.
You have been tasked with escorting Mótsog to the peak above Gundabad, where the last of the Greymauls will confront Hrímil Frost-heart.
'It is a long way to the summit, friend of Durin. We cannot stop now.'
You have been tasked with escorting Mótsog to the peak above Gundabad, where the last of the Greymauls will confront Hrímil Frost-heart.

'We are nearly there.'

Mótsog looks out over the yawning brink, unconcerned by the great height. The waning light of day occupies his every thought.

'I will face the dragon, but I will need you to stand against her minions. Can you do this?'
You have been tasked with escorting Mótsog to the peak above Gundabad, where the last of the Greymauls will confront Hrímil Frost-heart.
'We must reach the top before the setting of the sun.'
'Then come, friend of Durin.'
Climb the mountainside with Mótsog, last of the Greymauls
'While there is still time left.'
You have been tasked with escorting Mótsog to the peak above Gundabad, where the last of the Greymauls will confront Hrímil Frost-heart.
'Forward! Keep climbing!'
A great cheer sounds from far below!
'This is the Black Stone Anvil of my friend Durin!'
'Stand aside. I have business with your master.'
'We must hurry! These cultists have delayed us too long!'
'I fight for Durin, the true lord of Gundabad.'
'Your minions are slain, Hrímil Frost-heart.'
'This way, friend of Durin.'
'We are through. Now we must climb!'
Two leaders of the Angmarim have blocked your way up the slope to Hrímil Frost-heart, and they must be defeated if Mótsog is to reach the dragon.
You have been tasked with escorting Mótsog to the peak above Gundabad, where the last of the Greymauls will confront Hrímil Frost-heart.
Gorgar has succumbed to the voice of the dragon. He must be defeated if Mótsog is to face Hrímil Frost-heart.
As the sun sets behind distant hills, Mótsog's time on this world draws near its end.\n\nThe dragon still lives.
'Did I not warn you, Rúvaran?'
'The enemies of Angmar will be swept away!'
'What are you doing here?'
'It belongs to me now, and will be the centrepiece of Angmar's ascension!'
'The dragon is not my master.'
'I serve Angmar, now and forever!'
'When we have finished etching these runes upon its surface...'
'...we will use it to bring down the mountain!'
Defeat Ailgar and Rúvaran
With sunset comes the end of Mótsog, and the end of Durin's hope
'I have strength enough to slay you, worm.'
Confront Hrímil Frost-heart
'Friend of Durin... follow me...'
The sun slips behind the distant hills
'Stand behind the anvil... friend of Durin...'
Defeat Gorgar the Ruthless
The dragon flees, wounded and in terror: Gundabad is yours!
'All I can!'
Stand with Mótsog
'This is some foul dwarf-magic. I want nothing to do with it.'
'Slay him yourself!'
'I will not join my brother in death for you!'
Instance: The Last Greymaul
'I refuse!'
Talk to Mótsog
'I remember you, dwarf.'
'How is it you still live?'
